'Lewis Owen McGibbon' (born in Warrington, 14 July 1991) is an English actor,
whose first film performance was the critically praised role of Anthony, the
elder and more materialistic son in Danny Boyle's 2004 family comedy,
[[Millions]]. His first television performance was a minor part in the BBC
police drama Mersey Beat shown a few days before his tenth birthday.

He is currently studying in his first year of a Joint Honours Dance and Drama
degree at the University of Cumbria
